example.text: The Canadian government introduced in the House of Commons legislation to extend federal regulatory authority over provincial government-owned telephone utilities in Alberta , Saskatchewan and Manitoba .
example.arg: to extend federal regulatory authority over provincial government-owned telephone utilities in Alberta , Saskatchewan and Manitoba
